attributes.action: Not hold another referendum on the EU
attributes.additional_details: The majority of voters elected to Leave the EU. There was a turnout of 72% of the eligible electors which is very high (the second highest in history). The decision has been made and no other referendum is required.
attributes.background: A referendum was held on Thursday 23rd June 2016 with a straight forward question. Should the UK Remain or Leave the EU.
